reviewText: For those who collect, you know what to expect with model and poses . Only down fall is you can tell this was not digitally recorded or I got a bum disk. Other than that it was titillating

I purchased this off UK amazon i review it on US amazon has well. Exellent DVD the girl on cover is called patricia better known has Monika Hajkova she does 3 stripteases very hot girl well worth purchasing
Excellent Hotbody video with no shortage of beautiful models.  Standard Hotbody format for fans of Hotbody.  Those not familiar plenty of beaver shots.

This is my 1st foray into Hot Body DVDs, and I admit I am pleasantly surprised. The formula is basic - hot girls dance sexy, strip and show their "stuff". What makes this better than 90% of the other junk in this genre is the attention to pink, which you rarely see in these things (they usually act like they're "too good" to show it).

The girls - no Ms. America's, but pretty hotties that would make the top 3 babes at your average high-end strip club. Good variety - multi-racial, natural & fake, blondes, brunettes, tall , short, etc...highlights were Mason Marconi (fake but hot) on a bed & Sara St. James aka Jacqueline Lovell in a hot tub - Jacqueline is the hot star of those sexy Surrender vids - unlike those, you get to see more (all) of her here. A must for Jacqueline fans!

The scenes - basic locales, indoor, a lot of outdoor, tub, etc...decent digital quality, good lighting and production (a bit too much voice over about the girls for me, but it doesn't last long). Not much imagination here, but ok.

The action - the standard lapdance "gyrating" you see in these type flicks, but with hot squats & spreads. They cut to the chase pretty quickly. Some girls are sexier dancers than others. Gets it done. Would have liked more scenarios, something...

Pink factor - High marks on this - promenantly featured from all the girls. Plenty of close-ups, nice spreads, front & rear, well lit - what separates HBI stuff from the rest.

Would probably give it 3.5 stars if I could, but it is worth checking out.
